title: "I turn off chat because any strategy can be communicated with pings."

replies.body: i have been in favor of getting rid of chat and just having pings... no chat no verbal abuse no toxicity via chat
This quote should be on the front page of League.

you ping 'assist me'
you ping top after baron-they will back if needed-
you ping 'danger'
you blank ping yasuo and then ping assist top and then blank ping yas again and ping assist top

you know what, im done dude, you're claim is hideous and very poorly thought

Sure pings can work in the moment if you're a master of threading them together in the heat of the moment, but planning ahead is impossible. Also, Using nothing but pings is like speaking in nothing but metaphors. Sure it can work, but there is always a chance something can be lost in translation. Sure when you blank pinged Yasuo and then pinged assist top Yasuo went top, but so did the rest of your team.

Besides, when did lower Elo teammates ever pay attention to pings?
Don't worry kid when the new client comes out people will be yelling at each other on voice chat.

I feel like those messages you think can't be communicated by pings only show how:
A) You don't use pings yourself, therefore, you don't know what they could be used for
B) You're unaware of the ping changes, and the larger versatility being added (Ex: Pinging amounts of gold, Timers, etc.)
C) You shouldn't mute everyone if it's such an issue, only specifically toxic individuals. I have yet to be put into a game where /muteall is ever needed

* To Note, I rarely use chat anymore because pings are not only effective, but a huge time saver and less likely to spawn toxic chat.

If you've ended up muted, you earned it. If that's a problem, you should consider why you're being muted.

If that answer is because of the other player, well, it sounds like you couldn't change them then and you won't change them now.
